org.framed.orm.ui.editPolicy

Class ORMShapeGraphicalNodeEditPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • GraphicalNodeEditPolicy
      • org.framed.orm.ui.editPolicy.ORMShapeGraphicalNodeEditPolicy

  • public class ORMShapeGraphicalNodeEditPolicy
extends GraphicalNodeEditPolicy
    This GraphicalNodeEditPolicy handles request for the creations of all kinds of Relations between Shapes and creates and returns the necessary commands for that purpose. NewObject = O/o SourceEditPart = S/s TargetEditPart = T/t
    Author:
    Kay Bierzynski

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ORMShapeGraphicalNodeEditPolicy() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean childrenTest(EditPart target, EditPart source)
      This method tests if target edit part model is a child model of the source edit part model.
      protected Command getConnectionCompleteCommand(CreateConnectionRequest request)
      protected Command getConnectionCreateCommand(CreateConnectionRequest request)
      protected Command getReconnectSourceCommand(ReconnectRequest request)
      protected Command getReconnectTargetCommand(ReconnectRequest request)
      boolean isCompleteOK(CreateConnectionRequest request)
      This method tests if the conditions for the creation completion of a Relation kind(except Relations from type total, irreflexive and cyclic) are fulfilled.
      boolean isStartOK(CreateConnectionRequest request)
      This method tests if the conditions for the creation start of a Relation kind(except Relations from type total, cyclic and irreflexive) are fulfilled.
      boolean parentTest(EditPart target, EditPart source)
      This method tests if target edit part model is the parent model of the source edit part model.
      protected void showCreationFeedback(CreateConnectionRequest request)
      The feedback is only shown when the target edit part model is not the model parent of the source edit part model.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ORMShapeGraphicalNodeEditPolicy

        public ORMShapeGraphicalNodeEditPolicy()

    • Method Detail

      • showCreationFeedback

        protected void showCreationFeedback(CreateConnectionRequest request)
        The feedback is only shown when the target edit part model is not the model parent of the source edit part model. (this restriction is important for the creation of Relations in a Shape from type role group)

      • getConnectionCompleteCommand

        protected Command getConnectionCompleteCommand(CreateConnectionRequest request)
        Returns:
        ORMRelationshipConstraintCreateCommand( in case a Relation from type cyclic, total or irreflexive should be created) or ORMRelationCreateCommand( in case any other Relation should be created)

      • getConnectionCreateCommand

        protected Command getConnectionCreateCommand(CreateConnectionRequest request)
        Returns:
        ORMRelationshipConstraintCreateCommand( in case a Relation from type cyclic, total or irreflexive should be created) or ORMRelationCreateCommand( in case any other Relation should be created)

      • getReconnectTargetCommand

        protected Command getReconnectTargetCommand(ReconnectRequest request)
        Returns:
        null

      • getReconnectSourceCommand

        protected Command getReconnectSourceCommand(ReconnectRequest request)
        Returns:
        null

        public boolean parentTest(EditPart target,
                 EditPart source)
        This method tests if target edit part model is the parent model of the source edit part model.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • isCompleteOK

        public boolean isCompleteOK(CreateConnectionRequest request)
        This method tests if the conditions for the creation completion of a Relation kind(except Relations from type total, irreflexive and cyclic) are fulfilled.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • isStartOK

        public boolean isStartOK(CreateConnectionRequest request)
        This method tests if the conditions for the creation start of a Relation kind(except Relations from type total, cyclic and irreflexive) are fulfilled.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • childrenTest

        public boolean childrenTest(EditPart target,
                   EditPart source)
        This method tests if target edit part model is a child model of the source edit part model.
        Returns:
